contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.petar_description: With extensive experience in AI and machine learning, Petar leads the technical aspects of our projects. His expertise ensures that we deliver innovative and efficient solutions for automation and analytics.
contact.josipa_description: Josipa specializes in market analysis and digital marketing strategies. She helps our clients understand their market and reach their target audience effectively through data-driven insights and innovative marketing solutions.
contact.form_description: If you have any questions or would like to get in touch, please fill out the form below.
contact.automation_description: Automating business processes with cutting-edge AI technology.
contact.analytics_description: Data-driven insights to help your business grow.
contact.innovative_solutions_description: Creative solutions tailored to your unique challenges.

home.description: Connect with your textbooks, tests, and PDFs in a whole new way. ChatDocko AI offers a seamless interface for students and teachers to interact with their educational materials. Enhance your learning experience with AI-driven insights and interactive content.
home.feature1_description: Chat with your books and get answers to your questions in real-time.
home.feature2_description: Easily upload and integrate your study materials, including tests and PDFs.
home.feature3_description: Leverage advanced AI to gain insights and enhance your learning journey.
home.cta_description: Sign up now and take your learning to the next level with ChatDocko AI.
